poem:
{0}'s life has been the poem I would have writ
But I could not both live and utter it

Cerulean's blue
Emerald's green
{0} is the queen
Yes, {0} is the queen

I love {0},
{0} loves me.
How we met
is a mystery.

Buster, Sparkle, Newbie, Speedy
and then there's {0}, our smallest kitty.
One, two, three and four and five,
they're so frisky, so alive.

{0} is always right.
Get used to it.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet
and {0} is too.

If I had a flower for every time I thought of {0},
I could walk in my garden forever.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
If I had a flower
{0}, I'd give it to you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
When I dream at night,
{0}, I dream of you.

Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
I'd never met perfection,
{0}, until I met you.

{0}, you're the type of person
That makes forever seem too short.

{0}'s love is like a red, red rose
Which is better than a rubber hose
up your nose

{0} brought me sunshine
when I saw only rain,
{0} brought me laughter
when I felt only pain.

I love {0} for a life time,
Not only a day
I love {0} for who you are,
not what you do or say.

I keep myself busy
with the things I do.
But every time I pause,
{0}, I think of you.

{0} sticks with you till the end,
like a straight line that will not bend.

{0} is whatever a moon has always meant,
 and whatever a sun will always sing.

I want to get close to {0} like
shoes with laces,
teeth with braces,
Orasentencewithnospaces.

The apple of my eye,
The gem of my heart,
{0}, nothing in the world
Will keep us apart.

For where ever in this world you may roam,
in my heart {0} will always be home.
appreciate: {0}, everything you touch turns to gold!
